original_text: He sent them off to Lebanon in shifts of ten thousand a month, so that they spent one month in Lebanon and two months at home. Adoniram was in charge of the forced labor.
korean_text: 솔로몬이 그들을 한 달에 만 명씩 번갈아 레바논으로 보내매 그들이 한 달은 레바논에 있고 두 달은 집에 있으며 아도니람은 감독이 되었고

sentences.original_text: He sent them off to Lebanon
in shifts of ten thousand a month
so that they spent one month in Lebanon
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 그들은 레바논에서 한 달을 보냈다

sentences.original_text: Adoniram was in charge of the forced labor
